item.title: The 5 Myths of Creativity
item.description:
The 5 Myths of Creativity

Mention the word creativity, and people begin to squirm in their chairs. The very thought can prompt anxiety, fear, and doubt--even in the most accomplished professionals. Let's explore some common myths, and uncover the truth behind this "fuzzy" topic: MYTH 1: Creativity is only needed at the top TRUTH : In today's business environment, creativity applies to everyone.

item.title: 6 Things Exceptionally Creative People Do to Keep Their Ideas Flowing
item.description:
6 Things Exceptionally Creative People Do to Keep Their Ideas Flowing

We all associate creativity with painters, musicians, and chefs, but creativity isn't limited to the arts. Creativity in business is one of the most useful but infrequently trained and cultivated skills. The common belief that "you either have it or you don't" further hampers employees' efforts to increase their own creativity aptitude.

item.title: Giving Up Is the Enemy of Creativity
item.description:
Giving Up Is the Enemy of Creativity

What determines whether the ideas we generate are truly creative? Recent research of ours finds that one common factor often gets in the way: we tend to undervalue the benefits of persistence.

item.title: 20 Ways To Be Creative When You Don't Feel Inspired
item.description:
20 Ways To Be Creative When You Don't Feel Inspired

Let's be honest. We all want to know how to be creative on days that seem completely dreadful and leave us feeling totally uninspired and stuck. Either the words just aren't coming or the visual concepts are unreachable. It just seems like any or all of the ideas are at a stand still.

item.title: In a 24/7 world, disconnecting from work requires some creativity - The Boston Globe
item.description:
In a 24/7 world, disconnecting from work requires some creativity - The Boston Globe

It took a wake-up call on the playground to make Beth Monaghan realize she needed to better separate her life from her work. Her then 18-month-old daughter zipped down the slide and crashed into her - while she was checking her e-mail on her phone.
